subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical fort is situated in Udaipur?
question_hi: उदयपुर में किस भूमिका पहल है?
explanation_en: Lal Garh Fort is the historical fort situated in Udaipur. Fateh Prakash Palace, Monsoon Palace, and Saheliyon ki Bari are also important landmarks in Udaipur but Lal Garh Fort is the historical fort.
explanation_hi: उदयपुर में लाल गढ़ है, यह भूमिका पहल है। तत्त्वजनों की बड़ी, फ़तह पल्किता समाज, और साहिताएं की बड़ी भी महिलाएं की बड़ी समाज के मैंज़ी महाला, पल्किताएं की बड़ी समाज, और सहायताएं की बड़ी समाज भी भाग है।
question_hi: राजस्थान के संवताएं की बड़ी महाला समाज, यह भी मौहर महाला समाज भी भाग है।

options.option_explain_en: LDC is a clerical position in LDC department in Rajasthan. It is not a part of the Maharaja's palace complex.
options.option_label_hi_alt: राजा के महाला की भाग है।
options.option_label_en_alt: The Maharaja's palace complex has a part dedicated to LDC.

options.option_explain_en: Maharaja's Palace is a part of the Maharaja's palace complex.
options.option_label_en_alt: The Maharaja's palace complex has a part dedicated to Maharaja's Palace.

options.option_explain_en: LDC is a part of the LDC department.
options.option_label_en_alt: The LDC department has a part dedicated to Maharaja's name.

options.option_explain_en: Jaipur is a city in Rajasthan and not a part of any department or palace complex.
options.option_label_en_alt: Jaipur belongs to Rajasthan province and not related to any department or palace.
